title: Understanding Developmental Period
text: The developmental period refers to the time in a person's life when they are growing and developing. This period is crucial for diagnosing intellectual disabilities.

title: Age Range for Developmental Period
text: The developmental period typically includes childhood and adolescence. Consider the age range that encompasses these stages.

title: Identifying the Age Limit
text: Think about the age by which most individuals complete their developmental milestones. This age is often used as a cutoff for the developmental period.
